2.caption_en: A tall, symmetrical light-blue double-headed arrow pointing upward and downward against a pale, grid-like background. The design includes a central white divider and translucent horizontal bands for a minimalist, geometric look.
2.caption_ru: A tall, symmetrical light-blue double-headed arrow pointing upward and downward against a pale, grid-like background. The design includes a central white divider and translucent horizontal bands for a minimalist, geometric look.

3.caption_en:
A pale, grid-based "Ecosystem Strategy" workshop template with labeled horizontal layers (Sustainability, Ecosystem Journey, Engagement, Intelligence, Infrastructure, Success Factors) and two large translucent arrows (horizontal in the Ecosystem Journey row and vertical through the center) for visual emphasis.

{
  "title": "Ecosystem Strategy template",
  "type": "workshop_template",
  "creator": "fastbreak.one",
  "download_url": "http://www.platforminnovationkit.com",
  "labels": [
    "Sustainability Layer",
    "Ecosystem Journey",
    "Engagement Layer",
    "Intelligence Layer",
    "Infrastructure Layer",
    "Success Factors"
  ],
  "layout": {
    "rows": 6,
    "columns_estimate": 10,
    "grid_visible": true
  },
  "visual_elements": [
    {
      "kind": "arrow",
      "orientation": "horizontal",
      "position_row": "Ecosystem Journey",
      "color": "translucent_red",
      "span": "center_columns"
    },
    {
      "kind": "arrow",
      "orientation": "vertical",
      "position_column": "center",
      "color": "translucent_blue",
      "span": "multiple_rows"
    },
    {
      "kind": "footer",
      "text": "ECOSYSTEM STRATEGY",
      "branding": [
        "PIK (Platform Innovation Kit)",
        "fastbreak.one"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "colors": [
    "light_green",
    "light_pink",
    "light_blue",
    "teal",
    "light_grey"
  ],
  "notes": "Blank template for mapping ecosystem strategy across layered dimensions; includes branding and QR/partner logos in footer."
}
